channel.title: 317 :: RuneDiversion - A Diversion from Reality
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[IMG]http://runediversion.com/serverpics/logo.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.IMGur.com/1O2v0Pb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3f/House_icon.png[/img][COLOR=red]Website: [URL=http://runediversion.com]RuneDiversion | Home/Forums[/URL][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pTjHflr.png[/img][COLOR=red]Desktop Client: [URL=http://runediversion.com/play/diversionclient.jar]RuneDiversion Game Client[/URL][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pTjHflr.png[/img][COLOR=red]Webclient:[URL=http://runediversion.com/index.php?/topic/1-webclient-go-to-here-to-play-via-browser/] Webclient Page[/URL][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.IMGur.com/iSyYxLi.png[/img]
[COLOR=purple]-Duo Slayer -Donator Custom Yell Titles -Target system -Dwarf Multi-cannon -Bank Tabs -Switchable gameframes -Client settings -Money Pouch -Revenant cave -Killsteam system -Player user titles -Curses/quick prayers -Full summoning with working specials -All skills trainable with their own skilling zone -Stable economy -Pking is fun, and worth value -Trivia Bots -Perfect boss animations with multiple attack styles -Great shops to fulfill the needs of players -Working clue scrolls -Perfect bridding, welfare, pure, range, mage pking -Great pvm community -Unique barrows with interface -Very unique teleport interface offering many teleports -63 wave jad, log out between waves supported
------And so so much more to discover![/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.IMGur.com/WnU8Wb5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/9UEG4/455abb77ef.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9UEIt/fa775fe550.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9UFlw/a6152f4f96.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9UFpS/534796881c.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9UFAE/deaf53d3b7.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9UFHa/9b3d57871b.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9UFJz/95f3f8fb5b.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9UFM6/7298f050fa.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9UFPw/b8089b3fbd.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

item.title: 317 :: RuneDiversion - A Diversion from Reality

item.description:

[CENTER]

[COLOR=purple]-Duo Slayer
-Donator Custom Yell Titles
-Target system
-Dwarf Multi-cannon
-Bank Tabs
-Switchable gameframes
-Client settings
-Money Pouch
-Revenant cave
-Killsteam system
-Player user titles
-Curses/quick prayers
-Full summoning with working specials
-All skills trainable with their own skilling zone
-Stable economy
-Pking is fun, and worth value
-Trivia Bots
-Perfect boss animations with multiple attack styles
-Great shops to fulfill the needs of players
-Working clue scrolls
-Perfect bridding, welfare, pure, range, mage pking
-Great pvm community
-Unique barrows with interface
-Very unique teleport interface offering many teleports
-63 wave jad, log out between waves supported

------And so so much more to discover![/COLOR]
